page.title: 06WHERE EASTRIGGS PEOPLE WORK
page.content:
The main out of block employers of Eastriggs people include:_
CHAPELCROSS Atomic Power Station GD VIVERS Dornock. (Slaughterhouse) SCOTTISH SEAFOODS Annan (shell fish processing) PINNEY'S SMOKEHOUSES, Brydekirk (fish smoking) GLAXO Newbie, nr. Annan. (Pharmaceutical products) ORDNANCE DEPOT, Mossband, nr. Gretna 14 MAINTENANCE UNIT, Carlisle. (RAF Stores) NEI (COCHRAN & CO) Newbie, nr. Annan (Boilermakers) CHESHIRE CAT, Annan (Clothing factory) REGIONAL AND DISTRICT COUNCILS
Many people are also employed in small businesses in Annan, Carlisle, etc.
